ai-patthana17.17:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.17:1.1_0: It is in the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana17.17:2.1_0: Similarly instances the sixteenth section dealing with uninterruptedness, in between the sixteenth part of the lunar half-month, when all the flame of it all near, he does not entertain.
ai-patthana17.17:2.1_1: in the past, future, and present,
